books.name: GENESIS
books.title: This book contains the account of God making the world and everything there is and of his choosing the descendants of Abraham to be his people. We call this book Genesis

books.name: EXODUS
books.title: This book contains the account of God enabling his people, the Israeli people, to escape from Egypt and of giving some laws for them. We call this book Exodus

books.name: LEVITICUS
books.title: This book contains the account of God giving some more laws for his people Leviticus

books.name: NUMBERS
books.title: This book gives the account of the Israeli people after they escaped from Egypt. We call this book Numbers

books.name: DEUTERONOMY
books.title: This book contains the account of Moses’ final speeches to the Israeli people. We call this book Deuteronomy

books.name: JOSHUA
books.title: This book contains the account of the Israeli people possessing the land that God had promised to give them. We call this book Joshua

books.name: JUDGES
books.title: This book contains the account of people who delivered Israel from their enemies. We call this book Judges

books.name: RUTH
books.title: This book contains the account of Ruth, a non-Israeli woman who became an Israeli. We call this book Ruth

books.name: 1 SAMUEL
books.title: This book contains the account of what happened in Israel from the birth of Samuel to the death of King Saul. We call this book 1 Samuel

books.name: 2 SAMUEL
books.title: This book contains the account of King David reigning over all of Israel. We call this book 2 Samuel

books.name: 1 KINGS
books.title: This book contains the account of King Solomon’s reign and of Israel being divided into two kingdoms, Israel and Judah, after his death. We call this book 1 Kings

books.name: 2 KINGS
books.title: This book contains the account of the prophet Elijah and of many kings who ruled Israel and Judah until other nations conquered Israel and Judah. We call this book 2 Kings

books.name: 1 CHRONICLES
books.title: This book contains genealogies from Adam to the death of King David and the account of David reigning over all of Israel. We call this book 1 Chronicles

books.name: 2 CHRONICLES
books.title: This book contains the account of the reign of King Solomon and of the other kings of Judah until the Babylonians destroyed Jerusalem. We call this book 2 Chronicles

books.name: Ezra
books.title: This book contains the account of some of the people of Judah returning to Judah and rebuilding the temple. We call this book Ezra

books.name: Nehemiah
books.title: This book contains the account of Nehemiah supervising the rebuilding of the walls of Jerusalem and of teaching the people the laws that God wanted them to obey. We call this book Nehemiah

books.name: Esther
books.title: This book contains the account of Esther, the queen of Persia, protecting the Jewish people from Haman, who wanted to destroy them. We call this book Esther

books.name: JOB
books.title: This book contains the account of the intense suffering of Job and of God restoring him. We call this book Job

books.name: PSALMS
books.title: This book contains songs that the Israeli people sang. We call this book Psalms

books.name: PROVERBS
books.title: This book contains many wise things that King Solomon said. We call this book Proverbs

books.name: ECCLESIASTES
books.title: This book contains the account of King Solomon observing what people do and of realizing that only reverencing God and obeying him is worthwhile. We call this book Ecclesiastes

books.name: SONG OF SONGS
books.title: This book contains songs that King Solomon sang with his beloved. We call this book Song of Songs

books.name: Isaiah
books.title: This book is the account of Isaiah foretelling about God punishing Israel and then sending his chosen one and saving them Isaiah

books.name: JEREMIAH
books.title: This book is the account of Jeremiah foretelling about God punishing the Israeli people because they rejected him and would not repent. We call this book Jeremiah

books.name: LAMENTATIONS
books.title: This book contains the account of Jeremiah’s sorrow because of God punishing Israel. We call this book Lamentations

books.name: EZEKIEL
books.title: This book contains the account of Ezekiel foretelling about Jerusalem being destroyed and rebuilt. We call this book Ezekiel

books.name: DANIEL
books.title: This book contains the account of Daniel foretelling about God controlling all nations of the world and about the coming one. We call this book Daniel

books.name: HOSEA
books.title: This book contains the account of Hosea telling about the Israeli people rejecting God, and foretelling about God punishing and restoring them. We call this book Hosea

books.name: JOEL
books.title: This book is the account of Joel foretelling about many nations conquering the Israeli people and about God restoring them. We call this book Joel

books.name: AMOS
books.title: This book is the account of Amos foretelling about God punishing Israel and Judah and other nations, and restoring Israel and Judah. We call this book Amos

books.name: OBADIAH
books.title: This book contains the account of God telling Obadiah that Edom would be destroyed because of the evil they did to Israel. We call this book Obadiah

books.name: JONAH
books.title: This book is the account of Jonah disobeying God, being in a big fish’s belly three days, and finally going to warn Nineveh about God judging them. We call this book JONAH

books.name: MICAH
books.title: This book contains the account of Micah foretelling about God punishing Israel and Judah because of their evil leaders, and about restoring them by the leader coming from Bethlehem. We call this book Micah

books.name: NAHUM
books.title: This book contains the account of Nahum foretelling about Nineveh and the Assyrian people being destroyed. We call this book Nahum

books.name: HABAKKUK
books.title: This book contains the account of God revealing to Habakkuk that what God does is good. We call this book Habakkuk

books.name: ZEPHANIAH
books.title: This book contains the account of Zephaniah foretelling about God punishing the Israeli people and then restoring them. We call this book Zephaniah

books.name: Haggai
books.title: This book contains the account of the Israeli people obeying God’s message to them through Haggai and rebuilding the temple. We call this book Haggai

books.name: ZECHARIAH
books.title: This book contains the account of Zechariah foretelling about God restoring the Israeli people and establishing his eternal rule. We call this book Zechariah

books.name: MALACHI
books.title: This book contains the account of Malachi proclaiming that God loves his people, Israel, that he will punish them for their sins, and that later he will restore them. We call this book Malachi

books.name: MATTHEW
books.title: This book is the Gospel that Matthew wrote. We call this book Matthew

books.name: MARK
books.title: This book is the Gospel that Mark wrote. We call this book Mark

books.name: LUKE
books.title: This book is the Gospel that Luke wrote. We call this book Luke

books.name: JOHN
books.title: This book is the Gospel that John wrote. We call this book John

books.name: ACTS
books.title: This book contains the account of the first Christians. We call this book Acts

books.name: ROMANS
books.title: This book is a letter that the Apostle Paul wrote to the Christians at Rome. We call this book Romans

books.name: 1 CORINTHIANS
books.title: This book is one of the letters that the Apostle Paul wrote to the Christians at Corinth. We call this book 1 Corinthians

books.name: 2 CORINTHIANS
books.title: This book is one of the letters that the Apostle Paul wrote to the Christians at Corinth. We call this book 2 Corinthians

books.name: GALATIANS
books.title: This book is a letter that the Apostle Paul wrote to the Christians in Galatia province. We call this book Galatians

books.name: EPHESIANS
books.title: This book is a letter that the Apostle Paul wrote to the Christians at Ephesus. We call this book Ephesians

books.name: PHILIPPIANS
books.title: This book is a letter that the Apostle Paul wrote to the Christians at Philippi. We call this book Philippians

books.name: COLOSSIANS
books.title: This book is a letter that the Apostle Paul wrote to the Christians at Colossae. We call this book Colossians

books.name: 1 THESSALONIANS
books.title: This book is one of the letters that the Apostle Paul wrote to the Christians at Thessalonica. We call this book 1 Thessalonians

books.name: 2 THESSALONIANS
books.title: This book is one of the letters that the Apostle Paul wrote to the Christians at Thessalonica. We call this book 2 Thessalonians

books.name: 1 TIMOTHY
books.title: This book is one of the letters that the Apostle Paul wrote to his assistant Timothy. We call this book 1 Timothy

books.name: 2 TIMOTHY
books.title: This book is one of the letters that the Apostle Paul wrote to his assistant Timothy. We call this book 2 Timothy

books.name: TITUS
books.title: This book is a letter that the Apostle Paul wrote to his assistant Titus. We call this book Titus

books.name: PHILEMON
books.title: This book is a letter that the Apostle Paul wrote to his friend Philemon. We call this book Philemon

books.name: HEBREWS
books.title: This book is a letter that was written to Jewish believers. We call this book Hebrews

books.name: JAMES
books.title: This book is a letter that James, the brother of Jesus, wrote to Jewish believers. We call this book James

books.name: 1 PETER
books.title: This book is one of the letters that the Apostle Peter wrote to his fellow believers. We call this book 1 Peter

books.name: 2 PETER
books.title: This book is one of the letters that the Apostle Peter wrote to his fellow believers. We call this book 2 Peter

books.name: 1 JOHN
books.title: This book is one of the letters that the Apostle John wrote to his fellow believers. We call this book 1 John

books.name: 2 JOHN
books.title: This book is one of the letters that the Apostle John wrote to his fellow believers. We call this book 2 John

books.name: 3 JOHN
books.title: This book is a letter that the Apostle John wrote to Gaius, a fellow believer. We call this book 3 John

books.name: JUDE
books.title: This book is a letter that Jude, a brother of Jesus, wrote to his fellow believers. We call this book Jude

books.name: REVELATION
books.title: This book contains the account of Jesus giving the Apostle John some visions. We call this book Revelation
